mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(MEM_NO),0) FROM (SELECT MEM_NO FROM MY_SCRAP WHERE Q_NO=#{param1} AND MEM_NO=#{param2})

select rownum,ms.q_no,ms.mem_no,q.q_title,ms.my_scrap_date,b.book_ca_name,s.sub_ca_name,q.q_up,q.q_date from my_scrap ms,( select * from q) q,(select * from book_ca)b,(select * from sub_ca)s where ms.q_no = q.q_no and q.book_ca_no = b.book_ca_no and b.sub_ca_no = s.sub_ca_no and ms.mem_no=#{mem_no} order by ms.my_scrap_date desc
